<h1>Functional requirement `#`2000`-`003`-`003. Logout</h1>
<p><em>User requirement [UR2000003 #2000-003]</em></p>
<p>When menu item «Logout» from main menu is selected, current user session is destroyed and user is redirected to the page «<a href="https://projects-management.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/prototypes/login.html">Authorization</a>» (see functional requirement [FR1000001001 #1000-001-001]).</p>
